# Qualtrics
Qualtrics is an internal r package to help deal with qualtrics data. For example, providing a table of country information to match the default qualtrics country item.

# Installation
Qualtrics will not be made available on CRAN, but you can install the from github with:

```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
`devtools::install_github("lingtax/Qualtrics")`
```

# Usage
See vignettes for examples of use.
